meanings.sent1: The team had a predetermined plan for the game.
meanings.sent2: She followed the predetermined path to reach her destination.
meanings.sent3: The cat's predetermined nap time always made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His predetermined decision to quit his job shocked everyone.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's predetermined schedule made the class easy to follow.

meanings.sent1: The predetermined meeting time was set for 3 PM.
meanings.sent2: The predetermined order of events made the party run smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The dog's predetermined spot for napping was under the tree.
meanings.sent4: The predetermined rules of the game were strictly followed.
meanings.sent5: The predetermined route to the summit was challenging but rewarding.
